content.prompt: At the end of the first paragraph, the author compares English words to “amulets” primarily to

choices.label: suggest the pain occasioned by his classmates’ teasing
emphasize the extent of the power he ascribed to language
explain why he viewed English as more exotic than Japanese
imply that he would have preferred to communicate with his parents in Japanese

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
